titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives against the enactment of any reduction or delay in cost-of-living adjustments for beneficiaries under title II of the Social Security Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 3/9/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives against the enactment of any reduction or delay in cost-of-living adjustments for beneficiaries under title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act.
